title: 1885 Brookyn Dodgers - Baltimore Score Card For Sale
author: joedawolf

posts.post_title: 1885 Brookyn Dodgers - Baltimore Score Card For Sale
posts.post_content: I have an original 1885 Brooklyn Dodgers - Baltimore score card for sale. I have attached some photos.  Please make offers - thanks.

Just FYI, I know Judy and she is very trustworthy if anyone is considering this program.  I have bought some nice pieces from her over the years and I suggested she list this on the forum as it is a little out of my niche.

Rhys Yeakley

Thanks Rhys.  

I would consider all offers of $650 or more for this score card.
